review: Yes, there are tons of channels and things to watch, but not a lot that is VERY interesting. I also was not expecting to have to pay extra for some of the content. Obviously I have more to explore. I hope I like it better in the near future.
author: Anthony Beach "AJB"

review: Love it. Watch Netflix now more than regular network or pay television!
author: Stephen Blackwell

review: It's everything I thought it would be and more. I had trouble connecting it to my Wi-Fi, but once I got it connected it's been beautiful.
author: Tyrone P. Christian II

review: Works great -setup was very easy and the pictures are very good.  We have been binge watching all the shows we've missed
author: whyant earp

review: such a great product, I love my fire stick

review: This has been a great purchase.  Highly recommend it to all.  Also install KODI

review: Exceeded my expectations! Very easy to use!
